con:testCase.name: TestCase-DEV-BlockingData
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests manual and daily blocking and view data for different user roles ordered with requirements in SVN: /SRs/R18-11/SR-68972_NOVA_Data_Deletion_DRC/SR68972_U-036_DRC_ASRI.docx
Test case tests blocking msisdn data and views for difference user roles. After blocking data agant doesn't see any data not allowed from GDPR But Superviser continue to see all data.
1. Test manual blockink before msisdn is derigistered --> Expected: not allowed. 2. Blocking msisdn data with jobs. Blocking type is R --> Expected: Agent doesn't see any data from msisdn not allowed from GDPR 3. Blocking msisdn data manual. Blocking type is M --> Expected: Agent doesn't see any data from msisdn not allowed from GDPR -
Note! 2020-11-24 -MG: After consulting with Oleg:
ManualBlocking is processed sycron without jobs. Last job PROCESS_BLOCKING_REQUESTS must return 0 tasks. Last job CREATE_BLOCKING_REQUESTS must be executed after short delay. ENTRIES_EXPECTED in table MAINTAIN_REQUEST must be 0 in last validation step.

con:request.name: 10400N_manualBlocking-DD-NotAllowed
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:manualBlocking>\r <!--type: msisdn-->\r <msisdn>${#TestSuite#MSISDN-1}</msisdn>\r <!--type: string256-->\r <comment>TEST: Blocking not allowed for not register DD msisdn= ${#TestSuite#MSISDN-1}</comment>\r </v1:manualBlocking>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>The msisdn is already associated with other contract id</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:fault xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/"> <specificFaultType>BUSINESS_ERROR_ACCOUNT_ISSUE</specificFaultType> <errorMessage>The msisdn is already associated with other contract id</errorMessage> <errorCode>2000001129</errorCode> </ns2:fault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: 10410N_manualBlocking-CC-NotAllowed
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:manualBlocking>\r <!--type: msisdn-->\r <msisdn>${#TestSuite#MSISDN-2}</msisdn>\r <!--type: string256-->\r <comment>TEST: Blocking not allowed for not register DD msisdn= ${#TestSuite#MSISDN-2}</comment>\r </v1:manualBlocking>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>The msisdn is already associated with other contract id</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:fault xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/"> <specificFaultType>BUSINESS_ERROR_ACCOUNT_ISSUE</specificFaultType> <errorMessage>The msisdn is already associated with other contract id</errorMessage> <errorCode>2000001129</errorCode> </ns2:fault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: SELECT MAX(ID) as MaxID FROM MAINTAIN_REQUEST
SELECT ID, MSISDN, TX_TYPE, BLOCKED, BLOCKED_DATE FROM TOPUPS WHERE MSISDN='${#TestSuite#MSISDN-1}'
SELECT ID, MSISDN, TX_TYPE, BLOCKED, BLOCKED_DATE FROM TOPUPS WHERE MSISDN='${#TestSuite#MSISDN-2}'
SELECT ID, MSISDN,TX_TYPE,BLOCKED, BLOCKED_DATE FROM TOPUPS WHERE MSISDN='${#TestSuite#MSISDN-1}'
SELECT ID, MSISDN,TX_TYPE, BLOCKED, BLOCKED_DATE FROM TOPUPS WHERE MSISDN='${#TestSuite#MSISDN-2}'
SELECT ID, MSISDN,TX_TYPE,BLOCKED, BLOCKED_DATE FROM TOPUPS WHERE MSISDN='${#TestSuite#MSISDN-1}'
SELECT ID, MSISDN,TX_TYPE,BLOCKED, BLOCKED_DATE FROM TOPUPS WHERE MSISDN='${#TestSuite#MSISDN-2}'
SELECT ID, MSISDN,TX_TYPE,BLOCKED, BLOCKED_DATE FROM TOPUPS WHERE MSISDN='${#TestSuite#MSISDN-Charging}'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM MAINTAIN_REQUEST WHERE ID>${#TestCase#maxIDinDB} ORDER BY ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<10
SELECT ID, MSISDN,TX_TYPE,BLOCKED, BLOCKED_DATE FROM TOPUPS WHERE MSISDN='${#TestSuite#MSISDN-1}'
SELECT ID, MSISDN,TX_TYPE,BLOCKED, BLOCKED_DATE FROM TOPUPS WHERE MSISDN='${#TestSuite#MSISDN-2}'
SELECT ID, MSISDN,TX_TYPE,BLOCKED, BLOCKED_DATE FROM TOPUPS WHERE MSISDN='${#TestSuite#MSISDN-Charging}'
